sterile.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a person or animal that is sterile cannot produce babies
sterile.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Radiotherapy has left her permanently sterile.
sterile.translation[0].definitions[1].de: completely clean and not containing any bacteria that might cause infection
sterile.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Rinse the eye with sterile water.
sterile.translation[0].definitions[2].de: lacking new ideas, interest, or imagination
sterile.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: the increasingly sterile debate on political reform
sterile.translation[0].definitions[3].de: a sterile building, room etc is not interesting or attractive and is often very plain
sterile.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: The classrooms are sterile, with no artwork on the walls.
sterile.translation[0].definitions[4].de: sterile land cannot be used to grow crops
